snippet: Amir Hekmati, held on spying charges, has retained a lawyer with influential political ties who has lobbied successfully for another foreigner who was detained in Iran.
abstract: Amir Hekmati, former Marine incarcerated in Iran on spying charges, retains Iranian lawyer Mahmoud Alizadeh Tabatabaei to represent him in new effort to gain his release after nearly two and a half years in Tehran’s Evin Prison; Tabatabaei is well known in Iran as a legal representative for family of Ali Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani, former president and ideological pragmatist.
lead_paragraph: Amir Hekmati, held on spying charges, has retained a lawyer with influential political ties who has lobbied successfully for another foreigner who was detained in Iran.

headline.main: Former Marine in Tehran Jail Retains a Top Iranian Lawyer
headline.print_headline: Former Marine in Tehran Jail Retains a Top Iranian Lawyer
